intent_atoms.description: Implement placeholder nodes for missing children to guide operators toward absent structures and maintain contextual hex jumps.
Perform VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Secure real‑world media assets (Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG‑H) for regression baselines once licensing approvals are obtained.

functional_units.name: Placeholder Nodes for Missing Children
functional_units.description: Provide placeholder affordances to guide operators toward absent structures and maintain contextual hex jumps during tolerant parsing.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verify macOS and iPadOS hardware focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets for VoiceOver accessibility shortcuts.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to enable regression baselines with real-world media payloads.
